# Import Files and Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
books <- read_csv("books.csv")
```

# Look at the data
Data is 11,123 rows and 13 columns

```{r}
glimpse(books)
```

```{r}
names(books)
```


Check for missing values
Phew there aren't any
```{r}
books %>% 
  summarise(across(.cols = everything(), .fns = ~ sum(is.na(.x))))
```
